Leader.Comments: Ensure there is a large medi in the unreachable room.
And that it's in its vanilla position.

Followers.Comments: Scenario 1 - make the fake ladder real and the medi reachable.
Play some revelation music.
A glitched secret may be in the unreachable room, so move it to another glitched location.
Scenario 2 - make the fake ladder real but remove the medi.
Move the medi elsewhere.
Play some sad music.
A glitched secret may be in the unreachable room, so move it to another glitched location.
Scenario 3.1 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.2 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.3 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.4 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 4 - vanilla.
